Dear community,

We are proud to offer you plans from our ByteShack range. ByteShack platform was designed to fulfil gap with high speed disk arrays on Low End market. We achieved that 

 

with combination of CPU power and super fast SSD disk arrays. Result is speaking for it self. We achieved read and write speed comparable to biggest name in the 

 

industry for fraction of the price.Speed in combination with fast and friendly support gives you production ready environment for all your disk demanding tasks.

 

High traffic website with heavy DB, we are here for you, challenge our ByteShack platform to help you in your business.

All plans are running on 6 drives HW Raid 10 configuration. All nodes are monitored 24/7.

Our slogan is NOT A SINGLE BYTE OVERSOLD !!!

 

Setup is manual, you will get your VM after manual fraud check.

More about drServer.net

Family driven Sole proprietorship company based in Croatia. We have 3 permanent staff employed + 3 support contractors who operate in 3 different time zones. Staff members are all English speaking and they are based in Croatia, USA and Australia.

 

drServer started selling backup servers in 2012. In 2013 we expanded our product range to production ready VPS servers. In 2014 we was #10 in LEB/LET Top providers pool.

 

drServer operates: AbusiveCores.com, SugarVPS.com, Byteshack.net and XENstorage.com.

 

Thank you for your time reading this post and thank you for shown interest.
